messages.message: I can have Aaron V do some benchmarking on this next week, but we saw CPU/mem be a limitation in apps-server for large ibdocs.
similarly, saving annotations in ML Studio was really slow until we bumped up api-server-apps CPU
if anyone from Flow or infra can help us make sure we’re benchmarking correctly, that would be super helpful!

WRT the changes we made on citi, those were kind of a hack/workaround to support large documents. I don’t think they are realistic to use everywhere, so we might need a code fix to actually reduce the memory requirement. Happy to chat more about benchmarking/load testing though!
